Constructs new {{tt|bad_exception}} object.

@1@ Default constructor. {{rlpf|what}} returns an implementation-defined string.

@2@ Copy constructor. Initializes the object with the contents of {{c|other}}{{rev inl|since=c++11|. If {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} both have dynamic type {{tt|std::bad_exception}} then {{c|1=std::strcmp(what(), other.what()) == 0}}&lt;!-- LWG 471 --&gt;}}.
